fields.name: create_another_date_time_occurrence
fields.fieldText: Would you like to create another date & time occurrence?

fields.name: RegularScheduleDisplay
fields.fieldText: You have the opportunity to create occurrences for this opportunity that are at various times or occur on a regular schedule (such as every Monday or 1st Saturday of the month).

fields.name: Does_this_occur_on_a_regular_schedule
fields.fieldText: Does this occur on a regular schedule?

fields.name: X52OccurrenceLimit
fields.fieldText:
Note: You can only create a recurrence with 52 occurrences.
For Example, a daily occurrence can only go out 52 days. If you are creating weekly occurrences for the full year, only select 1 day of the week.

fields.name: StartText_0
fields.fieldText: Define the date range of this recurrence:

fields.name: EndTimeText_0
fields.fieldText: Set the start and end time for these occurrences.

fields.name: Finishmessage
fields.fieldText: Thank you for submitting a volunteer opportunity.

textTemplates.name: AdvancedVolOppFieldsText
textTemplates.text: The following fields are optional settings you can add to the Volunteer Opportunity.

textTemplates.description: The success message for creating an occurrence
textTemplates.name: CreateOccurrenceSuccessMsg
textTemplates.text: Success! You created an occurrence for the "{!Volunteer_Opportunity_Name}" volunteer opportunity.

textTemplates.name: DescriptionHelp
textTemplates.text: You will have the ability to add other formatting changes to your description after you submit your volunteer opportunity.

textTemplates.description: Provides the directions for inputting the description.
textTemplates.name: DescriptionInstructions
textTemplates.text: Make sure to provide a good description to your volunteers that includes the activities that they can expect to accomplish.

textTemplates.description: help text for the Registration Cutoff (in hours) field
textTemplates.name: RegistrationCutoffHelp
textTemplates.text: This field allows you to set the number of hours before the occurrence is schedule to start to cutoff the ability for new volunteers to sign up or express interest.

textTemplates.description: Help text for the does this occur on a regular schedule field.
textTemplates.name: RegularScheduleHelp
textTemplates.text:
You have the opportunity to create occurrences for this opportunity that are at various times or occur on a regular schedule (such as every Monday or 1st Saturday of the month).
Please select if this opportunity occurs on a regular schedule or not.

textTemplates.description: Help text associated with the Schedule Type field
textTemplates.name: ScheduleTypeHelp
textTemplates.text:
Schedule Type allows you to define how you'd like volunteers to serve for this opportunity.
Date & Time Specific is used when a set number of volunteers are needed at a specific date and time.
To Be Scheduled is used when a volunteer is scheduled to come in on an individual basis based on the needs of the organization and the availability of the volunteer.

textTemplates.description: help text for the special directions when creating a new location.
textTemplates.name: SpecialDirectionsHelp
textTemplates.text: Provide volunteers with any additional information about the location, such as where to park, the buildings name, or any other information that would assist the volunteer in locating the volunteer opportunity.

textTemplates.description: used when the Start Date is in the past
textTemplates.name: StartDateError
textTemplates.text: The date you entered is in the past. Please select a date greater than or equal to today.

textTemplates.description: Help text associated with the Type field to explain difference between Project and Activity
textTemplates.name: TypeHelp
textTemplates.text:
Project - a volunteer opportunity that will result in service hours
Activity - any other opportunity you wish to make available to volunteers such as recognition events, trainings, socials. Activities will be further defined on next page.

textTemplates.name: VolunteerLeader
textTemplates.text: Opportunity Coordinator options are filtered for contacts that have the profile name "Volunteer Leader" in their contact record.

textTemplates.description: Introductory text for creating a volunteer opportunity.
textTemplates.name: VolunteerOppIntroText
textTemplates.text: Please complete the following and we'll guide you through the process of creating a Volunteer Opportunity.
